00116 inline void DataSet::addSample (const Sample& sample)
00117 {
00118     if ( sample.first.size() not_eq nFeatures_ )
00119         throw NessieException ("DataSet::addSample() : The number of features in the sample is different from the one in data set.");
00120     else
00121     {
00122         samples_.push_back(sample);
00123         size_ = samples_.size();
00124         countCategories();
00125     }
00126 };
00127

00129 inline const DataSet::Sample& DataSet::getSample (const unsigned int& iSample) const
00130 {
00131     return samples_.at(iSample);
00132 };
